title: Environment
description: Environment name, the list of patches to apply is matched against what it supplied to the command via the "-e" switch. If none then "default" environment name is assumed.

^.*$.title: File Path or Glob Pattern
^.*$.description: Exact file path of a file or a glob pattern in the source folder to which the patches will be applied. If the pattern matches multiple files, the patches will applied to all files that match.
